public static String getMACAddress()
        Returns the MAC address in lowercase of the local machine with each group separated by a colon.

      • getMACAddress

public static String getMACAddress(String separator)
        Returns the MAC address in lowercase of the local machine with each group separated by the specified string.
        Parameters:
        separator - a separator string.
        Returns:
        the MAC address in lowercase of the local machine with each group separated by the specified string, or null if it cannot be retrieved.

      • getClassLocation

        @Nullable
public static Path getClassLocation(Class<?> clazz)
        Returns the path to the base location of the specified class.
        If the class is directly on the filesystem, then the path to the base directory is returned. For example, if the path to the class is /path/to/my/package/MyClass.class, /path/to is returned.
        If the class is inside a JAR file, the path to the JAR is returned.
        Parameters:
        clazz - a class.
        Returns:
        the path to the location of the specified class. If a valid path cannot be found, null is returned.
